name: Moharram Challenger
content: About Moharram Challenger | Moharram Challenger | University of Antwerp Campus Groenenborger Show email address Tel. +3232651731 Groenenborgerlaan 171 2020 Antwerpen, BEL Campus Middelheim Show email address Tel. +3232651731 Middelheimlaan 1 2020 Antwerpen, BEL Prof. Moharram Challenger received his PhD in IT from the International Computer Institute at Ege University in 2016. During 2010-2013, he was a team leader of a bilateral project between Slovenia and Turkey. From 2012 to 2016, he was the R&D director of UNIT IT Ltd, leading 1 national project funded by TUBITAK and 2 international software-intensive projects in Europe (ITEA ModelWriter and Assume). In 2017 & 2018, he was an assistant professor at Ege University. From Jan 2019 to July 2020, he was a post-doc researcher at the University of Antwerp, working on Flanders Make projects. Also read our Privacy statement Strictly necessary cookies They are necessary for the proper functioning of the website and can not be switched off. They are generally defined only as a result of actions you carry out and that enable you to make use of the services we offer (definition of your privacy preferences, connection, filling in forms, etc.). You can configure your browser so that these cookies are blocked or you are warned about these cookies, but then some parts of the site will no longer work. Statistical cookies They allow us to measure surfing patterns and determine which sections of our website were visited, and to measure habits and improve our services. They show us which pages are the most and the least popular and how visitors move around the site. If you do not allow these cookies, we do not know when you visited our site and we can not check their habits. Personalization cookies They enable improved functionality and customization of the site. They can be activated by us or by third parties whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies, some or all of the services may not work properly. Targeted cookies They can be set up by our advertising partners on our site to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant ads on other sites. They do not store personal information directly, but are based on the unique identification of your browser and device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will see less targeted ads.
